DEMO_527_MSG_010:
̂Sadly, our Anses... he never returned, as you surely know now. He died fighting them, and his will died with him.
ā
DEMO_527_MSG_020:
̂He couldn't defeat the Break Monsters and purify Mother, who was eventually fully consumed by the darkness.
ā
DEMO_527_MSG_100:
́Ay dios mio, Lenate! We need Señor ȁ, though!
We'd never stand a chance without him...
DEMO_527_MSG_030:
̂To carry on, we decided to create a clone of him, and 
have that be his successor to all of the Resistance...
DEMO_527_MSG_110: ̂Heroics aside, Birdie... we need to purify Mother to eradicate the darkness, as it's the source of all the Break Monsters.
DEMO_527_MSG_040:
̂It was our way of immortalizing Anses, and everything
he stood for. We dubbed this operation... Project JOKER.
ā
DEMO_527_MSG_120:
̂We cannot force him into this, despite what we wish...
You must make your own conscious decision about this...
ā
DEMO_527_MSG_050:
̂Along the way, however, we encountered several flaws among the original designs of this operation...
ā
DEMO_527_MSG_130:
̂I'll await your decision further inside this facility. 
When you've made up your mind... come speak with me.
DEMO_527_MSG_060: ̂We couldn't find a human with a body capable of containing Anses's full powers...
DEMO_527_MSG_070: ̂When you found out about this... the truth about yourself... you offered up your body to... become Anses.
DEMO_527_MSG_080:
̂This... would not be the first time you've made this 
decision, then... to become Anses and try to save the world.
ā
DEMO_527_MSG_090:
̂And yet, once more, you're forced to choose your path.
To either save the world... or let Anses's dream fade away...
